query: SELECT p.id, p.slug, p.title, m.name as module_name FROM pages p JOIN modules m ON p.moduleId = m.id WHERE m.name LIKE '%Divis%' ORDER BY m.id, p.`order` LIMIT 3
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3791tceNk2iYTis.4402e8216d86 --database T5Ee3HJGcPdFeU4iAe9r9p --execute SELECT p.id, p.slug, p.title, m.name as module_name FROM pages p JOIN modules m ON p.moduleId = m.id WHERE m.name LIKE '%Divis%' ORDER BY m.id, p.`order` LIMIT 3

rows.title: Divisão: A Operação Inversa da Multiplicação
